entry.title: Optimizing Input: Building your own customized keyboard
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker: Daniel Rios

Track:PyConDE Keyboards, the main way we interact with computers, have remained unchanged for a century, despite being free from mechanical necessity. Alternatives made possible by recent technology can optimize the way we input text and interact with our devices.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference. https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/WJGCNV Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
